title: JSON schema for VS Code IIS Express configuration file

port.description: The port number you wish to use for IIS Express

path.description: This property is optional & allows you to set a path to the folder or subfolder as the root of your site/project for IIS Express to run

url.description: This property is optional & allows you to set the URL you wish to open eg: '/about/the-team'

clr.description: This property is optional & allows you to set AppPool CLR version, 2.0 vs 4.0

protocol.title: Protocol
protocol.description: This property is optional & allows you to set http or https
